languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, я желаю доложить весьма компрометирующие сведения об одной из членов вашей свиты. А именно — о госпоже Джай Хейдари, коя, в сущности, никакой госпожой и не является, а является простолюдинкой, беглянкой от закона и дезертиршей из Имперской Гвардии. Данное обвинение подкреплено надежными уликами".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report highly compromising information about a member of your retinue. Namely, Mistress Jae Heydari, who it turns out, is nothing of the sort, but a commoner, a fugitive from the law, and a deserter from the Imperial Guard. I have solid evidence to prove it."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, я желаю доложить весьма компрометирующие сведения об одной из членов вашей свиты. А именно — о госпоже Джай Хейдари, коя, в сущности, никакой госпожой и не является, а является простолюдинкой, беглянкой от закона и дезертиршей из Имперской Гвардии. Данное обвинение подкреплено надежными уликами".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report highly compromising information about a member of your retinue. Namely, Mistress Jae Heydari, who it turns out, is nothing of the sort, but a commoner, a fugitive from the law, and a deserter from the Imperial Guard. I have solid evidence to prove it."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “大人，有件高度机密的事情，我必须向您汇报。这件事情关系到您的其中一位随行人员，也就是婕伊·海达利女士。事实证明，她的身份并非如她所言。她实际上是个平民，是帝国在逃犯，还是帝国卫队的逃兵。我有确凿的证据可以证明这一点。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report highly compromising information about a member of your retinue. Namely, Mistress Jae Heydari, who it turns out, is nothing of the sort, but a commoner, a fugitive from the law, and a deserter from the Imperial Guard. I have solid evidence to prove it."

traits.locale_text: “大人，有件高度机密的事情，我必须向您汇报。这件事情关系到您的其中一位随行人员，也就是婕伊·海达利女士。事实证明，她的身份并非如她所言。她实际上是个平民，是帝国在逃逃犯，还是帝国卫队的逃兵。我有确凿的证据可以证明这一点。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「陛下、あなたの従者の1人について、非常に危険な情報を報告せねばなりません。すなわち、ミストレス・ジェイ・ヘイダリは我々が思っていたような出自の人物ではなく、平民であり、法の逃亡者であり、帝国防衛軍からの脱走兵であったということです。それを証明する確かな証拠があります」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report highly compromising information about a member of your retinue. Namely, Mistress Jae Heydari, who it turns out, is nothing of the sort, but a commoner, a fugitive from the law, and a deserter from the Imperial Guard. I have solid evidence to prove it."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、あなたの従者の1人について、非常に危険な情報を報告せねばなりません。すなわち、ミストレス・ジェイ・ヘイダリは我々が思っていたような出自の人物ではなく、平民であり、法の逃亡者であり、帝国防衛軍からの脱走兵であったということです。それを証明する確かな証拠があります」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, debo informar de información extremadamente comprometedora sobre un miembro de su séquito. Concretamente la señora Jae Heydari, de la que ninguna de las tres palabras es cierta. Lejos de ser una noble, es una plebeya, prófuga de la ley y desertora de la Guardia Imperial. Tengo pruebas que lo demuestran».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report highly compromising information about a member of your retinue. Namely, Mistress Jae Heydari, who it turns out, is nothing of the sort, but a commoner, a fugitive from the law, and a deserter from the Imperial Guard. I have solid evidence to prove it."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, debo informar de información extremadamente comprometedora sobre un miembro de su séquito. Concretamente la señora Jae Heydari, de la que ninguna de las tres palabras es cierta. Lejos de ser una noble, es una plebeya, prófuga de la ley y desertora de la Guardia Imperial. Tengo pruebas que lo demuestran».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, je dois vous faire part d'informations particulièrement compromettantes au sujet d'une personne de votre entourage. Il s'avère que maîtresse Jae Heydari a usurpé son titre et est en réalité une roturière doublée d'une hors-la-loi, en plus d'avoir déserté la Garde Impériale. J'ai des preuves solides pour appuyer mes dires. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report highly compromising information about a member of your retinue. Namely, Mistress Jae Heydari, who it turns out, is nothing of the sort, but a commoner, a fugitive from the law, and a deserter from the Imperial Guard. I have solid evidence to prove it."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je dois vous faire part d'informations particulièrement compromettantes au sujet d'une personne de votre entourage. Il s'avère que maîtresse Jae Heydari a usurpé son titre et est en réalité une roturière doublée d'une hors-la-loi, en plus d'avoir déserté la Garde Impériale. J'ai des preuves solides pour appuyer mes dires. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich muss Euch höchst kompromittierende Informationen über ein Mitglied Eures Gefolges melden. Es geht um Herrin Jae Heydari. Wie sich herausgestellt hat, ist sie nicht, wer sie vorgibt zu sein, sondern eine Bürgerin, die vor dem Gesetz flüchtet, und eine Deserteurin der Imperialen Armee. Den Beweis dafür kann ich erbringen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report highly compromising information about a member of your retinue. Namely, Mistress Jae Heydari, who it turns out, is nothing of the sort, but a commoner, a fugitive from the law, and a deserter from the Imperial Guard. I have solid evidence to prove it."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich muss Euch höchst kompromittierende Informationen über ein Mitglied Eures Gefolges melden. Es geht um Herrin Jae Heydari. Wie sich herausgestellt hat, ist sie nicht, wer sie vorgibt zu sein, sondern eine Bürgerin, die vor dem Gesetz flüchtet, und eine Deserteurin der Imperialen Armee. Den Beweis dafür kann ich erbringen."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, maiyetinizin bir mensubu hakkında son derece itibar zedeleyici bazı bilgiler raporlamam gerekiyor. Üstat Jae Heydari'nin söylediği gibi biri olmadığı; bir avam, kanun kaçağı ve asker kaçağı bir İmparatorluk Muhafızı olduğu ortaya çıktı. Bunu kanıtlayabilecek somut delillerim var."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report highly compromising information about a member of your retinue. Namely, Mistress Jae Heydari, who it turns out, is nothing of the sort, but a commoner, a fugitive from the law, and a deserter from the Imperial Guard. I have solid evidence to prove it."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, maiyetinizin bir üyesi hakkında son derece itibar zedeleyici bazı bilgiler raporlamam gerekiyor. Üstat Jae Heydari'nin söylediği gibi biri olmadığı; bir avam, bir kanun kaçağı ve bir İmparatorluk Muhafızları asker kaçağı olduğu ortaya çıktı. Bunu kanıtlayabilecek somut delillerim var."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
